Docs.param: The context object associated with the translation requests.

A object representing the language into which documents are translated. The CultureInfo object must be enumerated by the service application proxy's method or a child of one of the enumerated CultureInfo objects.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of a object with a reference to the service context and the specified language.
